A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie\, if only just to see my dark force honey Kylo Ren.  His character growth alone is enough to keep me coming back for more.  If you enjoyed The Force Awakens you will probably like this movie.  We're not talking about Citizen Kane.  We're talking about a universe where certain people can move objects with their mind.  And one of those people is the beautifully tortured Ren!
